title: support ticket
body: cant login to send a ticket @@ it keeps telling me there is a problem and i need to try again in a minute

replies.body: Let's try something really quickly. Try [**clearing your browser history and cookies**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and if that doesn't work do me a favor and try a private/incognito window. From there, you could also try a new browser entirely, and as a last resort, you can always email our support at support@riotgames.com!
